text.tspan: * Response buffer (updated asynchronously in the background)
* Notifies BE about dequeueing and enqueing
* BE is responsible for requests synchronization
* Directs traffic based on BE Readiness
* Leader election, only one running at the time
* Hot adding and removing of repositories
* Notifies all registered FE about dequeue and enqueue operations
* Every repo has full data set
* All repos in "Active" status have identical data
* Repo in "Synchronizing" status is synchronized in the background
* Operation is always done on all repos at once
* BE serves configuration to registered FE
* Keeps entire configuration in one, JSON key - all BE have only ETCD endpoint configured
* Allows for leader election with TTL on objects, and a compare and swap operation
